about_the_game:
Welcome to "Tortuga City," a dark and futuristic metropolis where you and your turtle friends fight against the overwhelming force of the police. As the strategic leader of the group, you must fortify yourselves against the incoming troops and find a way out of the situation to survive. Develop various strategies to train soldiers, build defensive structures, and wisely utilize your resources as you navigate through the neon-lit streets and abandoned alleys.

Features


  • Cyberpunk Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a dystopian world full of dangers and secrets. Explore the dark streets of Tortuga City and discover abandoned areas while avoiding the siege of the police.
  • Tactical Survival: Build your base, strengthen your defense, and withstand the attacks of the police. Each day brings new challenges and threats, so stay vigilant and be ready to adapt your strategy.
  • Unique Turtle Jobs: Choose from a variety of professions for your people. Create a functioning society by distributing different roles that can withstand the pressure of the police.
  • Escape and Exploration: Search for hidden paths and secrets in the city to escape the police siege. Discover hidden resources, find useful equipment, and connect with other rebels to support your mission.
  • Dynamic Weather: Protect your people from the dangers of the weather by taking timely precautions and providing them with security.
  • Police's Secret Weapons: Unveil the dark secrets of the police force of Tortuga City as they deploy their advanced technology to overwhelm you.
  • Find Supporters: Expand your rebellion by recruiting allies and supporting them in your fight against the police.



...but be warned: the clock is ticking relentlessly as you only have 50 days to find an escape route before the police deploy their dreaded secret weapon and wipe you and your entire following out!
